about_the_game:
DLC Prime: unlocks new cosmetics on AmongUs Challenger (made by OrianaGames & by the community), the purchase of PRIME allows permanent access to regularly updated content including new hats, visors and Nameplates.

* You can participate in the creation of cosmetics content even if you do not have the PRIME DLC by going to the official Discord.

"This mod is not affiliated with Among Us or Innersloth LLC, and the content contained therein is not endorsed or otherwise sponsored by Innersloth LLC. Portions of the materials contained herein are property of Innersloth LLC. © Innersloth LLC."

name: AmongUS Challenger - Prime
short_description: DLC Prime: unlocks new cosmetics on AmongUs Challenger (made by OrianaGames & by the community), the purchase of PRIME allows permanent access to regularly updated content including new hats, visors and Nameplates.
